name: Corpse Clue
description:
As a coroner, you do not usually investigate very old corpses.
But your old friend Edward send you one with a mysterious note. You will have to find more information yourself.

Zoom, pan and rotation your camera to examine the body in detail. Use 4 different "lights" types to reveal different features. You can message Edward if you want more information.

Trigger Warning: creepy mood

Controls:
drag mouse left click: pan the camera
You can click with the mouse for everything else

Alternatively there is some keyboard binding:
Arrow keys: rotate camera
Page Up/Page Down: zoom camera
Scroll wheel: zoom camera

Made in 72h for Ludum Dare 48 by:

NuSan: code/design/visual
Lutopia: music

Skeleton & Heart 3D model are based on models from open3dmodel.com
Sound fx are based on freesound.org assets from users: Klangbild, shaunhillyard, skoul, Trollarch2, Veiler, hiddenpersuader, stomachache, siriuss22, bensnedde
